body_html: @girving it could be fixed in backward compatible way by adding back single argument version of tf.get_session_tensor, which was there before it was removed in 0.10 . I'll close this issue because there's a work-around by using dummy_handle, and fixing it now that it made into 1.0 API is probably too much work for what it's worth
